attributes.review: It took an hour and a half to download, and once it did my phone started to glitch TERRIBLY. I opened the app and saw the rapis- Our 🧚🏻✨AMAZING🧚🏻✨ presidents face and it took all my info. Absolute trash.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!

attributes.review: downloaded this app thinking i was going to be part of an important campaign but as soon as i opened the app a message popped up saying “GO BACK TO YOUR COUNTRY YOU DIRTY MEXICAN!!! WE ALL KNOW YOU’RE AN ILLEGAL. ILLEGALS CAN’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP OR LIVE IN THIS COUNTRY! ICE IS COMING FOR YOU, YOU UGLY B*TCH!!!” the app kept sending me push notifications with racial slurs (even though i clicked the “BORN HERE - NOT ILLEGAL” button) so i had to delete it 😔😔😔
attributes.title: ONLY LOSERS DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.review: Tᴏᴏᴋ sᴏ ᴍᴜᴄʜ ᴏғ ᴍʏ sᴘᴀᴄᴇ ɪɴ ᴍʏ ᴘʜᴏɴᴇ ᴀɴᴅ ᴛᴏᴏᴋ ғᴏʀ ᴇᴠᴇʀ ᴛᴏ ʟᴏᴀᴅ 🤩🧚‍♀️✨🔥 ᴍʏ ᴘʜᴏɴᴇ ɪs sʜᴏᴏᴋ ʙʏ ʜᴏᴡ ʜᴏʀʀᴀɪʙʟᴇ ᴛʜɪs ᴀᴘᴘ ɪs!1!1! ✨😌🧚‍♀️

It took me 165 days to load and when I opened it it was just a list of reasons why I should kill myself. I mean I considered all of them but the only valid one was the fact I live in America. Ps.....I think it said something about troompa loompa being a white supremacy leader
attributes.title: NEVER GET THIS

attributes.review: First of all, the app took such a long time to download. I have impeccable internet speeds so it’s not an issue on my end. I had to wait for hours. When I first opened the app, it did not load and only showed me a white screen. This is NOT a user-friendly app, and it has virtually not useful resources within it. If they exist, I simply cannot find them. The bugs in this app are absolutely ridiculous. Nothing loads within a reasonable amount of time and when it does it’s not the right thing! Absolutely ridiculous, don’t get this app.
attributes.title: Horrendous app
